name: "Oblivious To Ruin" CD
description:
Artwork hand-screened on matte brown digipak. Limited run of 350.

Released March 27, 2012
All songs written by Vulture, Copyright 2011
Recorded at Colfax Alley (Akron, OH), August 6, 7 & October 15 & 23
Engineered & Mixed by James Curl
Assistant Engineer Garrett Costlow
Mastered By Zach Moore
Art & Design by Chris Smith / burzum.deviantart.com
Printed by Commonwealth Press
Assembled by the Innervenus Music Collective 

1. This Beautiful Infection
2. Oblivious To Ruin
3. Dead Sea
4. Long I Crawl
5. Coming Storm
6. Bedridden
7. Apathetic Life
